title: DISABILITY & KNOWLEDGE with Tom Shakespeare
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: I discuss the ethical and epistemic issues surrounding disability with Tom Shakespeare: we cover the medical and social models, eugenics, disability and sexuality, standpoint epistemology, social justice, and the nature of knowledge.
